Class CharArraySet.CharArraySetIterator

java.lang.Object

Iterator
Enclosing class:
CharArraySet
public class CharArraySet.CharArraySetIterator
extends Object
implements Iterator

The Iterator for this set. Strings are constructed on the fly, so use nextCharArray for more efficient access.
